means: 德谟克利特 （约公元前460-370，古希腊哲学家）

sentence.Network_en: Democritus argued that matter is formed from discrete particles.
sentence.Network_cn: 德谟克利特认为物质是由分立的粒子构成的.

sentence.Network_en: Democritus thought bees spawned from the same source as maggots.
sentence.Network_cn: 德谟克利特认为蜜蜂的诞生和蛆如出一辙.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The Contrast of Atomisms of Democritus in Greece and Classic Vaisheshika in India古希腊德谟克利特与印度古典胜论的原子论比较

means.word_mean: 1. Greek philosopher who developed an atomistic theory of matter (460-370 BC)

auth_sentence.content: There is a continuity between them and Democritus, etc.
